statements: DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE id = 1;
DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 20;
DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 10 AND precipitation > 0.5;
DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
DELETE FROM WeatherData WHERE location_id = 1 AND date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM EnergyGeneration WHERE wind_generation > 1000 AND date < '2022-09-01';

DELETE FROM EnergyGeneration WHERE wind_generation < 100.0 AND solar_generation < 500.0;
